briefdescription.para: Path to database file.

Head of free list.
Root page ID for _sys_tables.
Root page ID for _sys_fields.
Root page ID for _sys_indexes (NEW!).
Maximum cache size.
Page cache.
Set of dirty page IDs.
Creates or opens a database file.

parameterdescription.para: Number of pages to cache in memory

briefdescription.para: Destructor - flushes all dirty pages.
Allocates a new page.

detaileddescription.para:
type
Type of page to allocate
Page ID of the allocated page
Uses free list if available, otherwise allocates new page

briefdescription.para: Deallocates a page (adds to free list).

parameterdescription.para: ID of the page to deallocate

briefdescription.para: Reads a page from storage.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the page to read

briefdescription.para: Writes a page to storage.
Flushes all dirty pages to disk.
Flushes a specific page to disk.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the page to flush

briefdescription.para: Gets the total number of pages.
Gets the file path.
Clears the page cache.
Get root page ID for _sys_tables catalog table.

simplesect.para: Root page ID, or 0 if not set

briefdescription.para: Get root page ID for _sys_fields catalog table.

simplesect.para: Root page ID, or 0 if not set

briefdescription.para: Set root page ID for _sys_tables catalog table.
Set root page ID for _sys_fields catalog table.
Get root page ID for _sys_indexes catalog table (NEW!).

simplesect.para: Root page ID, or 0 if not set

briefdescription.para: Set root page ID for _sys_indexes catalog table (NEW!).
Creates a new database file with metadata page (version 3 format).

detaileddescription.para: Page 0 Layout (New Format): Offset 0-15: "LearnQL Database" header (16 bytes) Offset 16-23: next_page_id (8 bytes) Offset 24-31: free_list_head (8 bytes) Offset 32-39: sys_tables_root page ID (8 bytes) Offset 40-47: sys_fields_root page ID (8 bytes) Offset 48-51: database version = 3 (4 bytes) [UPDATED from v2] Offset 52-59: created_timestamp (8 bytes) Offset 60-67: sys_indexes_root page ID (8 bytes) [NEW in v3]

briefdescription.para: Loads metadata from page 0 (supports v2 and v3 formats).

parameterdescription.para: if format is invalid or version is incompatible

briefdescription.para: Saves metadata to page 0 (supports v2 and v3 formats).
Evicts a page from the cache (LRU-like).
Storage engine managing pages and file I/O.

detaileddescription.para: Provides page-based storage with free list management

Features:
Page allocation and deallocation
Free list management for reusing deleted pages
Page caching for performance
RAII file handling
Transaction-like flush operations

File Layout:
Page 0: Metadata page (database info, free list head, etc.)
Page 1+: Data pages
